verses.verse: <S%H5869>Behold<s%>, my eye has <S%H7200>seen<s%> all <S%H241>this<s%>, my ear has <S%H8085>heard<s%> and understood <S%H995>it<s%>.
What you <S%H1847>know<s%>, the same do I <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H5307>also<s%>: I am not inferior unto you.
<S%H199>Surely<s%> I would <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>, and I <S%H2654>desire<s%> to <S%H3198>reason<s%> with <S%H410>God<s%>.
<S%H199>But<s%> you are <S%H2950>forgers<s%> of <S%H8267>lies<s%>, you are all <S%H7495>physicians<s%> of no <S%H457>value<s%>.
O <S%H5414>that<s%> you would <S%H2790>altogether<s%> hold your <S%H2790>peace<s%>! and it should be your <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> now my <S%H8433>reasoning<s%>, and <S%H7181>listen<s%> to the <S%H7379>pleadings<s%> of my <S%H8193>lips<s%>.
Will you <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H5766>wickedly<s%> for <S%H410>God<s%>? and <S%H1696>talk<s%> deceitfully for <S%H7423>him<s%>?
Will you <S%H5375>accept<s%> his <S%H6440>person<s%>? will you <S%H7378>contend<s%> for <S%H410>God<s%>?
Is it <S%H2895>good<s%> that he should search you <S%H2713>out<s%>? or as one <S%H582>man<s%> <S%H2048>mocks<s%> <S%H2048>another<s%>, do you so mock him?
He will <S%H3198>surely<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H5643>you<s%>, if you do secretly <S%H5375>accept<s%> <S%H6440>persons<s%>.
Shall not his <S%H7613>excellency<s%> make you <S%H1204>afraid<s%>? and his <S%H6343>dread<s%> fall upon <S%H5307>you<s%>?
Your <S%H2146>remembrances<s%> are <S%H4912>like<s%> unto <S%H665>ashes<s%>, your <S%H1354>bodies<s%> to <S%H1354>bodies<s%> of <S%H2563>clay<s%>.
Hold your <S%H2790>peace<s%>, let me <S%H1696>alone<s%>, that I may speak, and let come on me what <S%H5674>will<s%>.
Therefore do I <S%H5375>take<s%> my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> in my <S%H8127>teeth<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> in my <S%H3709>hand<s%>?
<S%H2005>Though<s%> he <S%H6991>kill<s%> <S%H3176>me<s%>, yet will I trust in <S%H3198>him<s%>: but I will maintain my own <S%H1870>ways<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
He also shall be my <S%H3444>salvation<s%>: for a <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> shall not <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H6440>him<s%>.
<S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H8085>diligently<s%> my <S%H4405>speech<s%>, and my <S%H262>declaration<s%> with your <S%H241>ears<s%>.
Behold <S%H6186>now<s%>, I have ordered my <S%H4941>cause<s%>; I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall be <S%H6663>justified<s%>.
Who is he that will <S%H7378>plead<s%> with <S%H2790>me<s%>? for now, if I hold my tongue, I shall give up the <S%H1478>Spirit<s%>.
Only <S%H6213>do<s%> not <S%H8147>two<s%> things unto <S%H5641>me<s%>: then will I not hide myself from <S%H6440>you<s%>.
<S%H7368>Withdraw<s%> your <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H7368>far<s%> from <S%H367>me<s%>: and let not your dread make me <S%H1204>afraid<s%>.
Then <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H6030>you<s%>, and I will answer: or let me <S%H1696>speak<s%>, and answer you <S%H7725>me<s%>.
How many are my <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> and <S%H2403>sins<s%>? make me to <S%H3045>know<s%> my <S%H6588>transgression<s%> and my <S%H2403>sin<s%>.
Why <S%H5641>hide<s%> you your <S%H6440>face<s%>, and <S%H2803>hold<s%> me for your <S%H341>enemy<s%>?
Will you <S%H6206>break<s%> a <S%H5929>leaf<s%> driven to and <S%H5086>forth<s%>? and will you <S%H7291>pursue<s%> the <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H7179>stubble<s%>?
For you <S%H3789>write<s%> bitter <S%H4846>things<s%> against <S%H3423>me<s%>, and makest me to possess the <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> of my <S%H5271>youth<s%>.

You <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> also in the <S%H5465>stocks<s%>, and look <S%H8104>narrowly<s%> unto all my <S%H734>paths<s%>; you set a <S%H2707>print<s%> upon the <S%H8328>heels<s%> of my <S%H7272>feet<s%>.
And <S%H7538>he<s%>, as a rotten thing, <S%H1086>consumes<s%>, as a <S%H899>garment<s%> that is <S%H6211>moth<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%>.
